stories.title: Trends in social mobility in postrevolution China
Ask HN: Is it possible to cut Russia from the internet?

stories.text:
After what happened to Faker.js, I've been trying to find ways to help open source maintainers. As you aware, there was a project on adding terminal ads, but this was not accepted well by the community.

My idea is to make a change to GitHub repo page and show a list sponsors. With their logo, clickable url, some text (if they want). I believe this will be a good advertisement channel for sponsors, it will, for sure, increase their visibility.

I'd push further, GitHub should allow more customizations to repo pages.
stories.title: Ask HN: How to contact GitHub product managers?
Russia's invasion of Ukraine could impact you

stories.text: Now that the dust has settled from the acquisition, has the culture held up? How's morale, work life balance, growth opportunity, etc.?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is GitHub still a desirable place to work?
Opinion: Our world's chilling return to authoritarianism

stories.text:
Do you have formally documented processes for all things? Or is there a pseudo system where experienced folks know how to get things done? Like buying new services on Aws/gcp, new products, changes to products, payments, expenses, hiring, etc.

Curious to learn how this differs between scale-ups and larger corporates, also, how different is it for software/tech people in across industries. Thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: How does your company deal with governance?
